attributes.action: Get GPS to see patients as normal again on a face to face basis, pre pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: All other healthcare workers have continued to work through the pandemic, GPs should return to work now too, enough is enough.
attributes.background: I want action because it is needed. People are fed up now of being fobbed off and signposted to other services.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
